name: Franky (Bumble-B)
description:
First Ludum Dare, first game A feeling of unfinished business and happiness, but it was really a great experience. So you have to help Franky - he’s alive! - to destroy the nearest village. Unfortunately you’ll have to slap him around to remind him of Franky - whose brain was that?

A point and click style - these are the ideas I couldn’t implement, but that’s only a postponement :)

  • music and sound
  • more enemies
  • more types of land
  • and much more…

Cheers from Belgium!

Change log:

  • 21th 04 2020: message when you beat up the game added (so you know) - no gameplay or whatever
